channel.title: Air Runes glitch?
channel.description: Anyways, I'm botting airs and I'm getting 102 runes per 28 essence with 32 RC. Is this a glitch considering I should only be making 112 a trip the next level?

item.title: Air Runes glitch?
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

I don’t think any bots support pouches.

Read full topic

item.title: Air Runes glitch?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:12, topic:354041”]The amount of air runes you generate per load of essence increases per load I think. Each level I went up, would increase 2-3 air runes each time. (By load, i mean 28 rune ess)[/quote]You don’t use pouches?

Read full topic

item.title: Air Runes glitch?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:8, topic:354041”]Lol Davidi, That part really did happen though. If you don’t believe me, tele to the burthorpe games room, walk to the climbing bootsman, and he says he sells for 12gp. If you buy from him though, its really 75k. (It might be 70k, i didnt examine/value)
ill try again and update you.[/quote]I know it’s real, I did it myself. But I wasn’t dumb enough to buy 40. And I meant I don’t believe you did it; I think you are just saying you did.

Read full topic

item.title: Air Runes glitch?

@eyeownyew wrote:

Lol Davidi, That part really did happen though. If you don’t believe me, tele to the burthorpe games room, walk to the climbing bootsman, and he says he sells for 12gp. If you buy from him though, its really 75k. (It might be 70k, i didnt examine/value)
ill try again and update you.

item.title: Air Runes glitch?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:6, topic:354041”]Nope. Oh, and now its doing 114. lol

EDIT: Ah, nevermind, its not a glitch. You just get chances of making the next multiplier for runes in between levels. I have a definite 4x multiplier now, but as I level up, more of the essence will have a 5x multiplier.[/quote]Oh ok.

Read full topic

item.title: Air Runes glitch?
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

Nope. Oh, and now its doing 114. lol

EDIT: Ah, nevermind, its not a glitch. You just get chances of making the next multiplier for runes in between levels. I have a definite 4x multiplier now, but as I level up, more of the essence will have a 5x multiplier.

Read full topic
